titles.title: There is no glory in my own wisdom

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is no glory in my own wisdom,
There is no power in my own strength, there is no might
In my own riches, but I will boast in knowing you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For You are high and lifted up, the glory of the nations
You are high and lifted up, Lord of all the earth.
You are high and lifted up, Creator, Redeemer,
For I will boast in knowing You.
